# navigationBarDrawer

**Type Property**

The search field appears in the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
static let navigationBarDrawer: SearchFieldPlacement
```

## Discussion

The field appears below any navigation bar title and uses the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SearchFieldPlacement/NavigationBarDrawerDisplayMode/automatic] display mode to configure when to hide the search field. To choose a different display mode, use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SearchFieldPlacement/navigationBarDrawer(displayMode:)] instead.

## Getting a search field placement

- **automatic**: SwiftUI places the search field automatically.
- **navigationBarDrawer(displayMode:)**: The search field appears in the navigation bar using the specified display mode.
- **sidebar**: The search field appears in the sidebar of a navigation view.
- **toolbar**: The search field appears in the toolbar.
